desc: Comrade Kisses is a division of Royal Kisses, LLC that provides mobile BLS/CPR courses serving the DFW area. Visit www.myroyalkisses.com or call 972-825-0558 to schedule your appointment for your facility/team

layout.text: Our courses are established and conducted based on the guidelines of & certifications are awarded via American Heart Association. We will come to your place of business for a minimum of 4 students per course time! Evening classes available for those with 24-hour staffing on Sundays!
SCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT FOR YOUR FACILITY TODAY!
